string.text: Hi stalker! I've got a bad news for ya. This is our territory and you will follow us now.
So be it. I'll follow you.
You are yet too young, sucker, to threaten me.

Thanks for rescuing me. Bandits, rascals they are, wanted to pass me on to the Monolith gang. And those half-zombies are rumoured to feed stalkers to monsters infesting the secret laboratory under the Monolith base.
What's the laboratory you are talking about?

Nobody knows, and the Monolith guys won't tell. I hear though bandits talking the Hog, their leader, possesses a counterpart key to the laboratory. But reaching the Hog is totally out of the question - his guards are utterly tough boys. Oh! I just remembered! I heard Serega crying out loud!
Well, if the bandits have it this tough, I definitely could do with a teammate.
Count me in. I'll help with what I can.
Great. Let's go.
Who is Serega?

He's another fighter of ours. I thought he hadn't made it, but when I was escorted down the road, I heard cries for help from the basement. That was him for sure. You're great in fighting, set him free.
Alright, will do my best to pull him out.
"Duty" will not forget you.
By the way, why YOU are not helping your friend? Now come, let's go with me.
I can't, you know. Have loads of stuff to do around. He's your friend, so go and help him out.
Well, I understand why you got scared. Bandits are not the weakest kind of guys.
Understood. See you.
Thanks for the help.
Don't even mention. I just helped a good guy.
Я тут подумываю скоро сваливать отседова, так что если есть че спросить - спрашивай.
Never mind. Bye.
Will you go with me?
I'll come with you. Will do my best.
Great. Let's go.
Sorry, our roads run in different directions.
Clear out then.
You failed to help me, so our paths don't run along any more. Get out.
So do you.
I feel pity for the teammate. He was a good buddy. But nevertheless, I'm in debt to you.

"Simply"! Provided it's not hard to get a suit in the bandit camp, finding out the password is next to impossible a task. None of the bandits will pour out to you. I hear bandits talking that the pass is also stored on PDA of Hog, bandits' leader, but he's completely impossible to reach - his guards are tough boys.
OK, thanks for the information.
You mentioned something about Serega...
Don't mention it. Make sure bandits never get you again.

Stalker, help us freeing a friend. "Duty" sent our scout group of three here, but we faced a bandit ambush on the way back. I found out that one of my teammates will now be escorted to the Monolith base, but, I'm afraid I won't be able to cope with them alone. Help me out, I will repay duly.\n
No probs. Lead the way.
Why the heck should I risk my own ass? You untangle this yourself.
Thanks, brother. We pulled out my teammate. Hold the award, well deserved.
The award is good, no doubt, but I could do with some help really. Will you go with me?
Deal.
You did some scouting around here, didn't you? What's interesting here in this area?
To the north there's a camp of bandits. To the east you'll locate the base of Monolith. To the south-west there's a neglected pig farm. There are also some gates nearby there.
Any more details on the bandit camp?

Bandits are based in the underconstructed building. Their leader is a brutal bastard named Hog. From the general perspective, he managed to get in contact with the Monolith guys and sends stalker captives to the Monolith base now and then. What for - I have no idea.
What's going on there on the Monolith base?

We found out that on the Monolith base there is an entrance to underground laboratory and it is the entrance which these crazy geeks are protecting. There are a lot of them there, so best would be to get onto the base secretively, carefully planning the moves and without raising the alarm.
What laboratory? What's inside there?

Now this is beyond me, we never made it inside. The only thing we found out - it's constantly closed. I heard from a bandit talk that the Hog, their leader, has somehow grabbed a counterpart key. Most likely he's about to intrude there himself.
Pig farm? Are there any pigs there too?

He-he, desperate for a stake? You are not in a restaurant, bro. Though, if you are up to some tasty pork, all around the Zone there're pigs, shining with radiation. Once you eat one of those, no more need for a torch in the night, you'll be radiating the light yourself! The pig farm is in limbo, some stalkers are queening around there. I didn't like them though, and I tell you, I trust my inner senses.
What are the gates you're talking about?
Can't get it really. The gates are closed, guarded by the Monolith gang. Sometimes lorries come from there to the Monolith base. That's all I know.
Understood, thanks.
No problem, feel free to ask anytime.
Were there only two of you in the scout group?
There was another one, Serega. No idea where he disappeared to. Didn't hear anything about him. Bandits must have killed him, rascals.
Take care.
My friend died. But you tried to help nevertheless. I stick to my words, so here's your award.
Пока.
I'm all ears.
Will you go with me?
I owe you, and I alway repay my debts. Let's go.
Ecellent. Now we'll smash them all.
Sorry, I have other plans to accomplish.
Well, good luck to you then.
See you.
What's up?
You did some scouting around here I guess. What's interesting in the area?
To the north there's a bandits' camp. Eastwards you will locate the Monolith base. In the south-west there is a neglected pig farm. Close to it there are some gates.
Any details on the bandit camp?

Bandits are based in the underconstructed building. Their leader is a brutal bastard named Hog. From the general perspective, he managed to get in contact with the Monolith guys and sends stalker captives to the Monolith base now and then. What for - I have no idea.
What's going on at the Monolith base?

We found out that on the Monolith base there is an entrance to underground laboratory and it is the entrance which these crazy geeks are protecting. There are a lot of them there, so best would be to get onto the base secretively, carefully planning the moves and without raising the alarm.
What laboratory? What's inside there?

Now this is beyond me, we never made it inside. The only thing we found out - it's constantly closed. I heard from a bandit talk that the Hog, their leader, has somehow grabbed a counterpart key. Most likely he's about to intrude there himself.
Pig farm? Are there any pigs there too?

He-he, desperate for a stake? You are not in a restaurant, bro. Though, if you are up to some tasty pork, all around the Zone there're pigs, shining with radiation. Once you eat one of those, no more need for a torch in the night, you'll be radiating the light yourself! The pig farm is in limbo, some stalkers are queening around there. I didn't like them though, and I tell you, I trust my inner senses.
And what are the gates?
Can't get it really. The gates are closed, guarded by the Monolith gang. Sometimes lorries come from there to the Monolith base. That's all I know.
Understood, thanks.
Not at all, feel free to ask if need be.
Were you only two in the scout group?
There was another one, Serega. Don't know where he disappeared. Heard nothing of him. Bandits must have killed him, scoundrels.
Thanks for the information.
Nothing. Just testing the communication.
Freeze! Say password.
Big Monolith
Nuclear Winter
Night sun
Password
Listen, I got plastered yesterday, forgot the password now. Let me in, I will repay as due.
Basically, I'm new here and haven't been entrusted the password yet. But I need to enter here - it's our leader's order.
What the damn is password? Let me in now, or you'll be in big trouble.
I missed the right building, sorry. Already leaving.
Hey, friend! I'm a "Duty" scout. Out of stupidity I got captured by bandits. Help me get outta here.
I'll try. Will do my best.
Frankly, I have no intention to deal with bandits. You get out of here on your own.

Thanks, brother. I owe you. Maybe this information will be of help to you: Hog, the leader of bandits, stores a key to the secret laboratory X18, which is entered somewhere from the Monolith base. But it's far from easy to get hold of the Hog - he's thoroughly guarded.\n
I think this information will be helpful to me.
I'll be making it out to my buddies now. The challenge is to arrive there live still.
Good luck. Maybe I see you around. Take care.
We need to retreat from here, the threat is to see bandits around here shortly. What did you want?Make it quick.
No, nothing.
Hey, friend. There on the wall there's a switch. It opens the grate's door.
Ok, I'll take a look.
Listen, maybe we come together? Will be easier when together, won't it?
Why not going. You helped me and the debts are good to pay back. Let's go.
That's pleasing to hear. Get going.

Need a piece? I located someone's stash near the Amber lake, there was a Hauss rifle. An excellent thing - hits deadly from a 100 meter distance. Can sell it, should this be of interest. For 300 roubles it's yours - would deliver in 2 minutes.
Here's the money. And be quick.
No, thanks, I don't want it.
Don't have the money. When I'm rich - I'll make sure to buy it.
So, did you decide to buy the gun?
Buddy, give me medikit.
Here you are
Come off it. Bugger off!
Thanks, pal. You've been of a great help. I owe you. Should we meet again some day - I'll repay as due.\n
No problem. Always happy to help a man in need.

I was there! I saw THIS! IT crawled into my brain and talked to me. IT was talking to me! In my head a horrible voice was sounding, scorching out the brains. Terrible... Terrible. Terrible! Don't go there! IT will become you same as it became me. A terrible headache... And the voice... Whispering to me.
Calm down, buddy. Everything's good, you are in safety now.

...whisper.. Whisper and squeak of children's swing... My daughter... I want to see her so much, but I can't appear before her. IT is in my head and now I became a beast myself. No, there's no way. Friend, pass the Bartender my artefact. This is all I could find there when IT crawled into my head. Bartender will pass it to my wife, my daughter. This will compensate to them..
What will it compensate?
